# In this session, you will:

1. Knit the same document to a different output format from an extension package ([`bookdown::html_document2`](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/bookdown-output.html#a-single-document))

1. Knit a new document to a slide presentation ([`powerpoint_presentation`](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/powerpoint-presentation.html))

1. Export your figures to a place you can find on your computer so you can share and re-use them. (can I use `knitr::fig.path` with `here` package??)

1. Add figure captions using `knitr` chunk options.

1. Add cross-references in text to figures.

1. Make a multi-panel plot.
